name: AGameStateBase
doc:
GameStateBase is a class that manages the game's global state, and is spawned by GameModeBase.
It exists on both the client and the server and is fully replicated.

GameModeClass: Class of the server's game mode, assigned by GameModeBase.
AuthorityGameMode: Instance of the current game mode, exists only on the server. For non-authority clients, this will be NULL.
SpectatorClass: Class used by spectators, assigned by GameModeBase.
PlayerArray: Array of all PlayerStates, maintained on both server and clients (PlayerStates are always relevant)
ServerWorldTimeSecondsUpdateFrequency: Frequency that the server updates the replicated TimeSeconds from the world. Set to zero to disable periodic updates.

methods.name: GetPlayerRespawnDelay
methods.doc: Returns how much time needs to be spent before a player can respawn

methods.name: GetPlayerStartTime
methods.doc: Returns the time that should be used as when a player started

methods.name: GetServerWorldTimeSeconds
methods.doc: Returns the simulated TimeSeconds on the server, will be synchronized on client and server

methods.name: HasBegunPlay
methods.doc: Returns true if the world has started play (called BeginPlay on actors)

methods.name: HasMatchEnded
methods.doc: Returns true if the match can be considered ended. Defaults to false.

methods.name: HasMatchStarted
methods.doc: Returns true if the world has started match (called MatchStarted callbacks)
